InvalidMachiene¶

class json_justify.jason.InvalidMachiene(message)¶

This is raised when you register invalid mahiene

InvalidContainer¶

class json_justify.jason.InvalidContainer(message)¶

This Class is used to Create Exception when Invalid Json is Provided to Manager or some invalid activity is encountered by Manager
